According to this=
 article, it was "introduced" to Japan in 1512:

http://www.um.u-tokyo.ac.j=
p/publish_db/Bulletin/no23/no23000.html

Yes, wives were moved from one hus=
band to another depending on who the Daimyo was trying to make alliances wi=
th.  Marriage was a political tool.
